body:
- [ ] ISSUE 1: Screens overlay when changing theme on the `Identifiers` / `Enable notifications` / `Welcome to web3` screens
- [ ] ISSUE 2: The created user is lost when going back from the `Identifiers` screen using the `swipe to the right` gesture (only Android with gestures enabled)
- [ ] ISSUE 3: The `back` button on the `Enable notifications` screen doesn't work 
- [ ] ISSUE 4: Extra `back` button on the `Enable biometrics` screen

Please let me know if some of these issues should be logged and fixed separately. 

# Bug Report


### ISSUE 1: Screens overlay when changing theme on the `Identifiers` / `Enable notifications` / `Welcome to web3` screens

**Steps:**
1. Install Status
2. Start creating a profile
3. Change mode from light to dark or vice versa on the `Identifiers` (`Enable notifications` / `Welcome to web3`)

**OS:** Android, iOS



https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/67952253/c78b70c0-6d57-431f-8051-ec8e90a96c10


### ISSUE 2: The created user is lost when going back from the `Identifiers` screen using the `swipe to the right` gesture (only Android with gestures enabled)

**Steps:**
1. Enable gesture navigation on your Android device
2. Start creating a profile
3. Right swipe on the `Identifiers` screen

**Expected result:** nothing happens, the gesture doesn't work here
**Actual result:** the `Intro` screen is opened, the created data is lost

**OS:** Android

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/67952253/ca0e138f-7073-4898-9338-3608ac4c7e8b


### ISSUE 3: The `back` button on the `Enable notifications` screen doesn't work 

**Steps:**
1. Start creating a profile
2. On the `Enable notifications` screen tap the back button

**OS:** Android, iOS

Button in the designs: https://www.figma.com/file/o4qG1bnFyuyFOvHQVGgeFY/Onboarding-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=4338-515458&mode=design&t=pryPMWb6qYQxgOAR-4 

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/67952253/26587f1b-cf8a-4de8-b693-24f8f7cb3d32


### ISSUE 4: Extra `back` button on the `Enable biometrics` screen

1. Start creating a profile
2. Check the back button on the `Enable biometrics` screen

**Expected result:** no back button on the screen
**Actual result:** button is added

**OS:** Android, iOS

Figma: https://www.figma.com/file/o4qG1bnFyuyFOvHQVGgeFY/Onboarding-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2884-327682&mode=design&t=pryPMWb6qYQxgOAR-4

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/67952253/0d26e33f-a68f-49f9-9a11-76406d9a939c
